name: Beat The Bot (Mr.ToadFrog)
description:
You (Gary Green) are on a show where you are faced off with beating a robot in a race.  If you win you get some coins and can race again against a harder opponent, if you lose you get your coins and can go again. Go quick and Beat The Bot.

Controls are WASD or arrow keys, levels are semi-randomly generated and allow for a new experience every run.

(I suggest you start on easy mode as the bot is quite hard in all modes)

There is also a two-player variant where you can race against a friend (if you can find one during this virus).

Made for Beginners circle game Jam

(I plan on making a video devlog later in the week so I'll upload it here once made)

This is the first game I made in a couple of months so I hope you enjoy :)
